DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is assessment of glycemic control and physicians satisfaction with results of DM2 OAD monotherapy
DOC.brief_title: Screening Epidemiological Program on Compensation Evaluation of Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 (DMT2) Patients on Oral Anti-diabetic (OAD) Monotherapy and Physicians Satisfaction of Their Usage
DOC.criteria: Patients have an established diagnosis of T2D Experience of therapy with one OAD during the from 6 months to 5 years before the registration in the Program Experience of therapy with two or more OADs and/or insulin therapy and/or incretin mimetics (exenatide) at any time before registration in the Program Absence of changes in HbAc1 level during the last year before registration in the Program
